humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of the three examined sentinel lymph nodes is positive for micrometastatic carcinoma (1/1). This corresponds to the N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system, as per New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total). The report also mentions N1mi, but since the number of metastatic lymph nodes is 1, the correct N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because there is 1 sentinel lymph node positive for micro metastatic carcinoma, with a metastatic focus measuring 1mm and no extra capsular extension. This is based on the information provided in Part 2 of the pathology report.
